name: Gospel OF Thomas
description:
The Gospel of Thomas; This is part one, of an ongoing series in my Visual Novel. These are the secret sayings that the living Jesus spoke and Didymos Judas Thomas recorded. 

Didymos gospels were discovered near Nag Hammadi, Egypt, in December 1945 among a group of books known as the Nag Hammadi library. ... The text's authorship by Thomas the Apostle is rejected by modern scholars. These gospels were also omitted from the bible.
